Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLListItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.ListItem
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLListItem
public class SLListItem
extends ListItem
Subclass of ListItem that applies the stone-texture look. SLListViews use these by default, so you usually won't need to explicitly create them.

SLListItem()

drawBackground(Graphics, Rect)
Overridden to let the list view's background image (if there is one) show through.
drawStringInRect(Graphics, String, Font, Rect, int)
Overridden to draw selected item over textured background with white text.
